Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #51 51st Reroute at 51st/Princeton
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via near 51st/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Princeton, 55th, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Princeton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
